name: Solution
description: Represents a detailed description of a customer issue and the resolution of that issue.
summary:
The Solution object in Salesforce represents a knowledge base entry that can be used to address common customer inquiries or issues. It contains the following attributes:

1. **Id** (`id`): A unique identifier for each solution.
2. **IsDeleted** (`boolean`): Indicates if the solution has been deleted.
3. **SolutionNumber** (`string`): A unique number assigned to each solution.
4. **SolutionName** (`string`): The name or title of the solution.
5. **IsPublished** (`boolean`): Indicates if the solution is published internally.
6. **IsPublishedInPublicKb** (`boolean`): Indicates if the solution is published in the public knowledge base.
7. **Status** (`picklist`): The current status of the solution (e.g., Draft, Reviewed, Published).
8. **IsReviewed** (`boolean`): Indicates if the solution has been reviewed.
9. **SolutionNote** (`textarea`): Additional notes or comments related to the solution.
10. **OwnerId** (`reference`): The ID of the user or group that owns the solution.
11. **CreatedDate** (`datetime`): The date and time when the solution was created.
12. **CreatedById** (`reference`): The ID of the user who created the solution.
13. **LastModifiedDate** (`datetime`): The date and time when the solution was last modified.
14. **LastModifiedById** (`reference`): The ID of the user who last modified the solution.
15. **SystemModstamp** (`datetime`): A system-generated timestamp indicating the last time the record was modified.
16. **TimesUsed** (`int`): The number of times the solution has been used.
17. **LastViewedDate** (`datetime`): The date and time when the solution was last viewed.
18. **LastReferencedDate** (`datetime`): The date and time when the solution was last referenced in reports or other contexts.
19. **IsHtml** (`boolean`): Indicates if the solution content is in HTML format.

This comprehensive set of attributes allows organizations to manage, track, and utilize their knowledge base solutions effectively within Salesforce.
label: Solution
